overview: As Chief Experience Officer, Andrew Sirotnik has helped to establish Fluidâ€™s reputation as one of the leading digital shopping providers serving retailers and branded manufacturers. An early advocate of merging brand and eCommerce, Andrew has successfully developed truly integrated shopping experiences for leading brands from pure play and multi-channel retailers to branded manufacturers. Andrew has been a digital shopping pioneer since 1996 when he launched one of the first eCommerce portals while at Entasis Design + Development, an interactive media firm he co-founded. In 1997, Entasis Design + Development merged to form Fluid, Inc.
